flavor_text_entries.black:
It breathes through a hole in its tail
while it burns with an internal fire.
Durant is its prey.
flavor_text_entries.white:
Using their very hot, flame-covered
tongues, they burn through Durant’s
steel bodies and consume their insides.
flavor_text_entries.black-2:
It draws in air through its tail,
transforms it into fire, and uses it like
a tongue. It melts Durant and eats them.
flavor_text_entries.white-2:
It draws in air through its tail,
transforms it into fire, and uses it like
a tongue. It melts Durant and eats them.
flavor_text_entries.x:
Using their very hot, flame-covered tongues,
they burn through Durant’s steel bodies and

flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
Using their very hot, flame-covered tongues,
they burn through Durant’s steel bodies and
consume their insides.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
It draws in air through its tail, transforms it into fire,
and uses it like a tongue. It melts Durant and
eats them.
flavor_text_entries.sword:
There’s a hole in its tail that allows it to draw in
the air it needs to keep its fire burning. If the
hole gets blocked, this Pokémon will fall ill.
flavor_text_entries.shield:
A flame serves as its tongue, melting through the
hard shell of Durant so that Heatmor can devour
their insides.
